Posted by dukke v

PLUTO

Member since Jul 2006

205828 posts

Mike wade. Back in early 2019 I think , he went to his ex girlfriends house and killed her and her mother and her new boyfriend in a fit of jealousy. Two teenagers were able to escape and call police. I knew this dude very well. He was a hotshot driver for me and was even in my house drinking a beer… he threw three lives away and his own in what the BRPD called a crime of RAGE…. He said he was to drunk to talk to police that night…. All over a piece of arse… shame……. He needs to go straight to the table and be executed……. Yet to this day there has yet to be any kind of hearing or anything involving this.

to mikelbr

Nobody mentioned Jan Waters murdering her Husband in their White Oak Landing house?

It even made a Nightmare Next Door Episode about it. The details are fricking crazy how she planned it out and took kids to the Kenner hotel and hurried back in middle of the night to murder him. She had a nice lil alibi lined up and all but security cameras got her diabolical arse.

WAFB Article about the case

quote:

In November 2012, the crew from Nightmare Next Door visited the WAFB studio to interview reporter Jim Shannon about the case. Shannon began reporting the details about the case in June of 2004 when Jan Waters, Alan Waters' ex-wife, was charged with his murder.

In October of 2010, in a surprise move from the main suspect, Jan Waters confessed to shooting her ex-husband, Alan Waters, in the chest on May 22, 2004. Jan and Alan had two children together.

Jan was sentenced to 20 years in prison

This post was edited on 8/24/21 at 11:34 am
